#################################################

Release Name:
Flip.Words.(HipSoft.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Flip Words
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
	Processor: Pentium 2 - 300MHz or better
	RAM: 128MB
	Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
	Operating System: Windows XP or Vista	
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Flip Words_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

You'll flip over this new word game! Make words by clicking on letters to solve familiar phrases. Once you recognize the phrase, you can submit your guess or, try to reveal all the letters for a special bonus! You'll never run out of phrases because you can create your own and automatically download new phrases created by others. Flip Words also lets you save your game and resume it later!

#################################################

FAQs
Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

Q: Does this require Steam?
A: No.

Q: Is this multilingual?
A: No. English is the only language supported.

A: Buy me a Mac and I'll figure it out.

Q: Will you marry me?
